items.question: What kind of images work best for HDR enhancement?
items.answer: Images with good lighting and clear subjects yield the best HDR results. The clearer and more detailed your original image, the more impressive the final result after enhancement.

items.question: Can I customize the HDR effect applied to my image?
items.answer: Yes! You can choose from various HDR styles and make specific adjustments to brightness, contrast, and color saturation to achieve your desired look.

items.question: How quickly can I get my enhanced images?
items.answer: The process is remarkably fast, typically taking only 1-2 minutes to receive your enhanced HDR image, making it easy for you to manage your workflow.

items.question: Are there any limitations on the number of images I can enhance?
items.answer: There are no limits! You can enhance as many images as you want, and our platform allows for batch processing to maximize your efficiency.

items.question: Do I own the rights to the images after enhancement?
items.answer: Absolutely! All images enhanced using our AI HDR effect include full commercial rights with no additional fees or royalties, allowing you to use them freely for any purpose.

items.question: What is the cost structure for using the HDR enhancement tool?
items.answer: We offer a flexible pay-as-you-go pricing model with no monthly subscriptions. You only pay for the images you enhance, ensuring affordability for all users.

items.question: Can enhanced images be used for commercial purposes?
items.answer: Yes, all enhanced images come with full commercial rights, enabling you to use them in product listings, marketing campaigns, and more without restrictions.

items.question: What support is available if I have issues or questions?
items.answer: We provide comprehensive support, including detailed documentation and tutorials. Our support team is available via email and chat for immediate assistance.

items.question: Is there a way to revert changes made by HDR enhancement?
items.answer: While the enhanced images are final, retaining your original files ensures you can always revert to them if needed. It's best to keep backups of your original images.

items.question: Can multiple users access the tool simultaneously?
items.answer: Yes, multiple users can access the platform at once, making it perfect for teams working in collaboration.
